attributes.action: Allow the Gurkhas who have fought for our country to stay in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I think its wrong to send the Gurkhas home the goverment is making people who have fought for a long time in major conflicts for our country its about time they started looking at rights and sending away people who only come over here to gain benefits.
The Gurkhas were wrong done to for a long time as they were paid a much lower rate than anyone else in the Army.
Allow these people who are honest and hard working to remain as one with us and return the medals too the people who have earnt them.

rejection.details:
There is a similar petition at:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Gurkha-soldiers/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
